paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Despite predictions of an increased likelihood of creating a de novo donor site by MaxEntScan for BRCA2:c.7828G>A(p.Val2610Met), there was no evidence for the predicted aberration from RT-PCR analysis.

functional_data.summary: No evidence for predicted aberration from RT-PCR analysis.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was predicted to create a de novo donor site but was not confirmed by functional assays.
key_quotes: Despite predictions of an increased likelihood of creating a de novo donor site by MaxEntScan for BRCA2:c.7828G>A(p.Val2610Met), there was no evidence for the predicted aberration from RT-PCR analysis.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: ESEfinder predicted potential disruption of binding of splice regulatory proteins for BRCA2c.440A>G(p.Gln147Arg).

functional_data.summary: Predicted disruption of binding of splice regulatory proteins.

variants.additional_notes: The variant's effect on splicing was predicted but not confirmed by functional assays.
key_quotes: ESEfinder predicted potential disruption of binding of splice regulatory proteins for BRCA2c.440A>G(p.Gln147Arg).

individual_records.evidence_sentence: For BRCA2:c.5278T>G(p.Ser1760Ala), additional genotyping of six individuals changed the Bayes segregation odds from 1.17 in the initial study to 1.38 in this study but did not alter the Class 2 classification.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was classified as likely not pathogenic based on additional genotyping.
key_quotes: For BRCA2:c.5278T>G(p.Ser1760Ala), additional genotyping of six individuals changed the Bayes segregation odds from 1.17 in the initial study to 1.38 in this study but did not alter the Class 2 classification.

tables_processed.table_caption: Summary of BRCA2 variants assessed in the study.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted with associated penetrance data.
